title: 5pcs Rapid One-handed Tourniquet Outdoor First Aid Kit Effective Life Saving
item_description:
5pcs Rapid One-handed Tourniquet Outdoor First Aid Kit Effective Life Saving
  Features:
Color: Black
Size: 96*3.8cm
Package including: 5 Tourniquets
【Life Saving Device】Our tourniquets advanced hemostatic technology, suitable for various body parts and sizes. The adjustable design ensures quick control of bleeding, providing crucial support in emergencies.
【Versatile and Multipurpose】Besides hemostasis, this tourniquet can also be used for binding and securing objects, such as damaged luggage or tent poles. With its various functions, it is an essential tool for any outdoor enthusiast or survivalist.
【Wide Range of Applications】This Tourniquet is suitable for various scenarios, including outdoor activities, military training, sports competitions, and more. Whether you are a professional or a regular consumer, you can benefit from it. Ensure you can respond quickly and effectively to unexpected injuries, providing comprehensive first aid support for you and your team.
【Rapid Using】One handed design for self using includes windlass and pre-marked time stamp 
【Durable & Lightweight】Perfect for home or car emergency kits, hiking or hunting packs, and more!
【Adjustable Size】 It suits for most of people hands and robust thigh.
Necessary life-saving tool during outdoor activities, emergencies, and survival situations.

title: Round-Cut Diamond X & Tapered Bar Miracle-Set Bolo Bracelet in Sterling Silver
item_description:
Round-Cut Diamond X & Tapered Bar Miracle-Set Bolo Bracelet in Sterling Silver
Flawlessly infuse a sophisticated accessory to your daily ensemble with our Sterling Silver Rose-Cut Diamond Bolo Bracelet. Crafted from fine .925 sterling silver with a bracelet that can stretch from 6" to 9” in length, this dazzling diamond tennis-style bracelet features 25 rose-cut diamonds equally segmented on each silver plate. Interconnected via matching x detailing, its delectable polished silver finish makes it a visually appealing jewelry. With a secure slider that allows the bracelet to be adjusted to comfortably fit around your wrist, this stunning silver bolo bracelet will make a great gift to commemorate any special occasion. Please note, the diamonds are natural, rose-cut, IJ color, and I3 clarity, which puts them at the lower end of the diamond color and clarity grading scale. Rose-cut, promo quality diamonds are milky and cloudy in nature. They have an asymmetrical ball shape and are filled with inclusions. Bracelet features secure slider and can adjust from 6" to 9" length for a custom fit

Specifications
Specifications
Product Specifications
Birthstone Month 1 April
Bracelet Clasp Type Bolo
Bracelet Length (in) 7
Country of Origin India
Total Diamond Quantity 25
Total Diamond Weight 0.27
Gender Women
Karat/Purity/Stamp .925
Metal Sterling Silver
Metal Color White
Gemstone Specifications
Gemstone 1 Type: Diamond, Clarity: I3, Color: I-J, Count: 25, Cut: Good, Origin: Natural, Setting: Miracle, Shape: Round, Total Weight: 0.27, Treatment: None
Policies
Return Policy
Return policy
Shipping Policy
Sizing Guide
About Us
Haus of Brilliance was founded by our grandfather, who started from humble beginnings as a rough diamond sorter, then mastered the craft of stone cutting and polishing. He began searching for the very best sources of rough diamonds, from Bombay to Israel to Belgium, faceting and polishing the stones himself. Soon, he had a following of loyal customers, and a business was born!

The company grew, and our grandfather opened offices in the heart of New York City’s “Diamond District.” He passed down his keen eye and dedicated work ethic to his sons, who joined the business and expanded into manufacturing and selling finished jewelry, with diamonds still the focus.

Fast forward to today! We, the founder’s grandchildren, are stepping into the family business over 5 decades after it all began. With training in gemology and apprenticeships in jewelry manufacture, we are dedicated to carrying our grandfather’s legacy of artisanship forward into the future.

We are proud to bring you our fine jewelry collections. Every stone is meticulously chosen, and expertly cut and polished to bring you the optimal balance of breathtaking sparkle and superb value. Our jewelry is carefully designed, and made by hand, by real people – skilled artisans who have polished their craft over a lifetime, who are valued employees who have been with our company for decades.

Brilliant pieces at no additional mark-up, we hope to introduce you to that fine jewelry piece that will be passed on in your family for decades to come. Jewels are forever – trust us, we know!

title: 1/10 Carat Real Diamond Miracle Plate S Link Bracelet in Sterling Silver 6-10
item_description:
1/10 Carat Real Diamond Miracle Plate S Link Bracelet in Sterling Silver 6-10
Elegant and timeless, this gorgeous 92.5% sterling silver bolo bracelet features 0.1 carat total weight of glittering round brilliant cut white diamonds with 10 stones in all. The bolo bracelet features each diamond in a faceted bezel style miracle plate setting surrounded by faux bypass style waves of silver. The unique miracle-plate settings center each genuine diamond in a mirror-finish, high-polish frame, giving the illusion of a much larger stone. These S shaped links sit between lengths of woven wheat chain. The bracelet features a secure slider that allows this bracelet to adjust from 6”-10”. This sweet lariat style bracelet makes a perfect gift for any occasion. It's a classic and feminine piece she'll want to show off every day. Give her a gift that will perfectly complement her favorite ensemble.

title: 1/10 Carat Real Diamond Wave Bracelet in 14K Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver
item_description:
1/10 Carat Real Diamond Wave Bracelet in 14K Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver
Certain to create a sophisticated look with any attire, this stylish diamond bolo bracelet is composed of 14k yellow gold plated .925 sterling silver. It features an alternating pattern of infinity links and a double heart links, one embellished with round-cut diamonds and the other crafted in yellow gold. Polished high to shine, the bolo clasp allows the chain bracelet to adjust easily on the wrist. Bracelet features secure slider and can adjust from 4" to 10" length for a custom fit

item_description:
Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver 1/2 ct Diamond Sideways Hearts Bolo Bracelet
This sweet and stylish bolo bracelet is a feminine look that will draw choruses of "oohs," "ahhs," and "awws." This charming piece is crafted of yellow plated .925 sterling silver and features a row of tumbling sideways heart silhouettes with clusters of round, pave-set diamonds. These dainty, sparkling diamonds total 1/2 cttw with an approximate H-I Color and I1-I2 Clarity. The sliding bolo clasp of this bracelet means it is 4”-10” adjustable to suit your sizing needs.

title: Front Skid Plate Engine Undercover For 2005-2015 Toyota Tacoma Bottom Aluminum
item_description:
Front Skid Plate Engine Undercover For 2005-2015 Toyota Tacoma Bottom Aluminum
EW-C414

10 Years Warranty  ELITEWILL - a Top Rated eBay store headquartered in New Jersey!  All Elitewill products ship from the USA (warehouse are located in many cities,such as NJ,CA,etc. We would ship out the package from the nearest warehouse to you) and get to your door FAST! We list new products and bundles everyday so check back often to see what's new! 

ELITEWILL is a store that constantly committed to the research and development of automotive parts.
We in-depth research product strength, durability and adaptability, provide the most professional service for every consumer.

 
Each part is manufactured to OEM specifications

About this item
【Fitment】Our front skid plates fit for Toyota Tacoma 2005-2015 4x4 or PreRunner only.
【Quality Craftsmanship】Made of high quality aluminum, light weight.Our PT212-35075 Skid Plate is built to last. Its durable design ensures long-lasting performance, giving you peace of mind during off-road adventures.
【Ultimate Protection】Precision-engineered for your vehicle, the 1/8-in. stamped, powder-coated skid plate helps protect the front-end chassis components from rocks and debris and prevents vibration stress and noise issues.
【Easy Installation】EASY TO INSTALL. Directly bolted underneath the front of the Vehicle Center.
【Enhance Off-Road Experience】With these skid plates, you can confidently take on rough terrains and challenging trails. Protect your vehicle and enjoy the thrill of off-roading with our reliable skid plates.
   NOTE: Items will be sent to your ebay shipping address only, so please confirm your available address on ebay before you pay.
Handling Time: All our items are shipped from the United States, your items will be shipped within 2 business day when we received payment. If you make an order and pay before 1 PM PST on business day, we will most likely ship out the item the same day!
Shipping Method: All items will be free of charge for Express Shipping via USPS, UPS or others. Absolutely Fast and Safe! Every package has tracking number. 
Estimated Delivery Time:
The United States package usually takes about 2-7 days to reach you. The actual time depends on the distance between the destination and the warehouse and the schedule of the post office.
International package usually takes about 7-20 days to reach you. After the package arrives in the eBay global transit ware, kindly please contact ebay customer service for the new status of the package.
We accept PayPal, MasterCard, Visa, American Express, Discover and etc payment.
           All Payments must be Confirmed (Shipping and billing addresses must match) Payment is required within 7 days from the date of the auction ending.
100% Satisfaction Guarantee: If you're not 100% satisfied with our items, simply return it for a full refund in 30 days (Items must be in new condition and in original package). Kindly please feel free to contact us before return. 
Return or Replacements: Support 10 years' Warranty. All product will be tested in 100% before delivery. If the item is was damaged in transit, kindly please contact us for a replacement or refund (Excluding contrived damage or misuse).
We left positive feedback for you after receiving payment. Your feedback is very important for us, positive feedback and 5 Score DSR is highly appreciated.
Please let us know before leaving any negative feedback or 1 point, 2 point low DSR or open any disputes on Paypal and Ebay, kindly please give us the opportunity to resolve any problems and we will try our best to satisfy your needs.
       Any question, kindly please feel free to contact us via "Ask seller a question". We try our best to reply to your emails as soon as possible, due to high volume of daily incoming emails and time zone difference, we may not be able to reply your emails immediately. Please allow 24 hours for us to response. Your understanding will be highly appreciated!

    Delivery details
  *We will ship it within 24-48 hours via ePacket, EMS, Fedex, UPS and DHL.
1) ePacket,  $0-$12, take 11-23 days. 
2) EMS, $15-25, take 7-23 days. 
3) Fedex, UPS and DHL, $18-$40, take 2-6 days. 
Different country the postage is different. When you check out, choose the right shipping service to you.
*We offer combine shipping service, more two items in one package, will save postage.

We promise our items as our description.
24K Gold, gold contents 999. Stamped the standard hallmark in Chinese.
24K Gold 3D craft, gold contents 999 too. Stamped the standard hallmark in Chinese. 3D is unique craft, the inner part is hollow. Looks big, but weight light, enough strong.
18K Gold, Hallmark Au750, gold contents 750. Solid gold.
14K Gold, Gold contents 585.

title: 1/10 Carat Real Diamond Link Bracelet in 10k Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver
item_description:
1/10 Carat Real Diamond Link Bracelet in 10k Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver
Elegant and timeless, this gorgeous .925 sterling silver bolo bracelet features 0.1 carat total weight of round, rose cut, promo quality diamonds with a whopping 24 stones in all. Rose-cut, promo quality diamonds are milky and cloudy in nature. The bolo bracelet features a length of alternating X-links and heart shaped links filled with diamonds between lengths of rope chain. The bracelet features a secure slider that allows this bracelet to adjust from 6”-9”. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with your choice of genuine rhodium (a platinum-family metal) or 10K yellow gold, ensuring it will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come. This sweet lariat style bracelet makes a perfect gift for any occasion. It's a classic and feminine piece she'll want to show off every day. Give her a gift that will perfectly complement her favorite ensemble.

Return policy
Shipping Policy
Sizing Guide
About Us
Haus of Brilliance was founded by our grandfather, who started from humble beginnings as a rough diamond sorter, then mastered the craft of stone cutting and polishing. He began searching for the very best sources of rough diamonds, from Bombay to Israel to Belgium, faceting and polishing the stones himself. Soon, he had a following of loyal customers, and a business was born!

The company grew, and our grandfather opened offices in the heart of New York City’s “Diamond District.” He passed down his keen eye and dedicated work ethic to his sons, who joined the business and expanded into manufacturing and selling finished jewelry, with diamonds still the focus.

Fast forward to today! We, the founder’s grandchildren, are stepping into the family business over 5 decades after it all began. With training in gemology and apprenticeships in jewelry manufacture, we are dedicated to carrying our grandfather’s legacy of artisanship forward into the future.

We are proud to bring you our fine jewelry collections. Every stone is meticulously chosen, and expertly cut and polished to bring you the optimal balance of breathtaking sparkle and superb value. Our jewelry is carefully designed, and made by hand, by real people – skilled artisans who have polished their craft over a lifetime, who are valued employees who have been with our company for decades.

Brilliant pieces at no additional mark-up, we hope to introduce you to that fine jewelry piece that will be passed on in your family for decades to come. Jewels are forever – trust us, we know!

title: .925 Sterling Silver Miracle Set Diamond Infinity Hearts Adjustable Bracelet
item_description:
.925 Sterling Silver Miracle Set Diamond Infinity Hearts Adjustable Bracelet
Express your affection to her with this dazzling bolo bracelet. Elegant and timeless, this gorgeous .925 sterling silver bracelet features open heart shaped links with infinity loops woven around each heart. Each link has petite diamonds lining one curve of the infinity loop with a single diamond in the center of the loop in a miracle-plate setting. The unique miracle-plate setting centers each genuine diamond in a mirror-finish, high-polish frame, giving the illusion of a much larger stone. The row of heart links sit between two lengths of wheat chain. The bracelet features a secure slider that allows this bracelet to adjust from 6”-9”. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with genuine rhodium or 10K yellow gold, ensuring it will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come. This sweet lariat style bracelet makes a perfect gift for any occasion. It's a classic and feminine piece she'll want to show off every day.

title: 1/4 Carat Real Diamond Bolo Bracelet in Two-toned Sterling Silver
item_description:
1/4 Carat Real Diamond Bolo Bracelet in Two-toned Sterling Silver
Add a dramatic accessory to your evening wear or business attire with our stunning Two-Toned Sterling Silver Rose-Cut Diamond Bolo Bracelet that features a classic x gold accents. Wonderfully designed, the combination of gold together with the 5 rose-cut diamonds on an interconnected .925 sterling silver plate resulted in a striking statement piece that is equally elegant and very eye-catching. With a secure slider that allows the bracelet to be adjusted to comfortably fit around your wrist, this two-toned diamond encrusted bracelet boast a total of 25 pieces of diamonds and crowned to perfection with a delectable shiny gold detailing. Please note, the diamonds are natural, rose-cut, IJ color, and I3 clarity, which puts them at the lower end of the diamond color and clarity grading scale. Rose-cut, promo quality diamonds are milky and cloudy in nature. They have an asymmetrical ball shape and are filled with inclusions. Bracelet features secure slider and can adjust from 6" to 9" length for a custom fit

title: 1/4 Carat Diamond Rondelle Ball Bead Cuff Bangle Bracelet in Sterling Silver
item_description:
1/4 Carat Diamond Rondelle Ball Bead Cuff Bangle Bracelet in Sterling Silver
This gorgeous .925 sterling silver cuff bangle bracelet features 0.25 carat total weight of round, brilliant cut diamonds with 90 stones in all. The bangle features sterling silver rondelle beads that are largest in the center and become smaller towards the outside of the bangle. There are rows of channel set diamonds between the rondelle beads. Polished to a brilliant shine, this 7-inch circumference cuff bangle sits comfortably on your wrist without the hassle of any closing mechanisms. The cuff has some flexibility to adjust for different wrist sizes. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with genuine rhodium (a platinum-family metal), ensuring it will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come. This classic cuff makes a great gift for any special occasion! Diamonds are thought to give the wearer clarity and illuminate solutions to life’s problems. Give her a gift that will perfectly complement her favorite ensemble.
